Type 1

phiv 2nd June 2019 at 8:37pm
Clue
Formula expressing the discovery of algebraic relationship type 1
offset1 = offset2ANDunknown_x1 = unknown_x2ANDcat_x1 = cat_x2ANDitem_x1 ≠ item_x2ANDunknown_y1 = unknown_y2ANDcat_y1 ≠ cat_y2=>rel (cat_y1, item_y1, cat_y2, item_y2) = VALUE_NO
  • Note that _x and _y indices can be swapped (and the processor needs to look for both)
